    • Method Detail

      • setType

        public void setType(java.lang.String value)

      • setDataIndex

        public void setDataIndex(java.lang.String value)
        The Ext.data.Store dataIndex of the field this filter represents. The dataIndex does not actually have to exist in the store.

        Defaults to: null

      • setUpdateBuffer

        public void setUpdateBuffer(java.lang.String value)
        Number of milliseconds to wait after user interaction to fire an update. Only supported by filters: 'list', 'numeric', and 'string'. Defaults to 500.

        Defaults to: 500

      • setActive

        public void setActive(boolean value)
        Indicates the initial status of the filter (defaults to false).

        Defaults to: false

      • getMenu

        public Menu getMenu()
        The filter configuration menu that will be installed into the filter submenu of a column menu.

        Defaults to: null

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        True if this filter is active. Use setActive() to alter after configuration.
